select.if: select TABLE_NAME as TABLENAME from information_schema.TABLES t where t.TABLE_SCHEMA=#{database} order by TABLENAME
select name as TABLENAME from sysobjects where xtype='u'
select TABLE_NAME as TABLENAME from user_tables order by TABLENAME

SELECT COLUMN_NAME COLUMNNAME,COLUMN_TYPE COLUMNTYPE,COLUMN_KEY COLUMNKEY ,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH DATALENGTH, IS_NULLABLE ISNULLABLE,COLUMN_COMMENT COLUMNCOMMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS T WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{table_name} AND T.TABLE_SCHEMA=#{database}
SELECT COLUMN_NAME COLUMNNAME,DATA_TYPE COLUMNTYPE,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH DATALENGTH, IS_NULLABLE ISNULLABLE,'' COLUMNCOMMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns WHERE TABLE_NAME=#{table_name}

SELECT b.COLUMN_NAME COLUMNNAME,b.DATA_TYPE COLUMNTYPE,b.DATA_LENGTH DATALENGTH, b.NULLABLE ISNULLABLE,b.DATA_SCALE DATASCALE,a.comments COLUMNCOMMENT FROM all_tab_columns b left join user_col_comments a on a.TABLE_NAME=b.TABLE_NAME and a.COLUMN_NAME=b.COLUMN_NAME WHERE b.TABLE_NAME = #{table_name} ORDER BY b.COLUMN_ID
